text:
Why would we? 
We can have a VM spooled up, the roles in, the PowerShell steps done in less
than 10 minutes start to finish. 
Final steps included as far as transferring the FSMO Roles and W32Time
authority. 
Philip Elder MCTS 
Senior Technical Architect 
Microsoft High Availability MVP
 
E-mail:  
Phone: +1 (780) 458-2028 
Web: www.mpecsinc.com
 
Blog: blog.mpecsinc.com
 
Twitter: Twitter.com/MPECSInc
 
Skype: MPECSInc. 
Please note: Although we may sometimes respond to email, text and phone calls
instantly at all hours of the day, our regular business hours are 8:00 AM - 5:00
PM, Monday thru Friday.
%40MPECSInc.Ca

metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] Extended Security Updates for Server 2012R2
